item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 14, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:

25. The world could run on older hardware if software optimization was a priority (705 points | 646 comments)
26. Vircadia, a Bun and PostgreSQL-powered reactivity layer for games (6 points | 3 comments)

28. Garbage collection of object storage at scale (78 points | 9 comments)
29. The great displacement is already well underway? (373 points | 375 comments)
